attributes.action: Kailash Pilgrimage denied access- Tibet Border closed
attributes.additional_details:
UK Government needs to take immediate action in mediating with Chinese Government to re-open the Tibet border.

This has impacted all UK Tourists trekking in this area. This year is a Special Year for all Hindu Pilgrims who cannot visit the Holy Mount Kailash in the western Tibet and is sacred to Buddhism, Hinduism and Jainism.
